name: Lucky Tlhalerwa - IMS Death Squad
description:
STORY:

IMS Death Squad is A Third-Person Story-Telling Action Shooter. Its Story Takes Place At The Same Time As The Original Super Incursion. IMS (Incursion Military Service) Sergeant David Grimes At The Start Of Operation: Winter Strike Is alerted by one of his teammates that the whole IMS Death Squad team is in danger, their superior officer and team commander COLONEL Sebastian Garrett has joined the Global Terrorism Con-Federation and as part of his entry into the enemy side, He has been instructed by GTC High Ranking Senior Commanding Officer MAJOR: Nickolai Patrikov, To murder His entire team (IMS Death Squad) and help sabotage IMS Operation: Winter Strike as one of his requirements to be fully admitted into the Global Terrorism Con-Federation. Now COLONEL Sebastian Garrett is working together with the Global Terrorism Con-Federation to murder his own team and help murder the 2 other Special forces teams carrying out Operation: Winter Strike.

IMS Sergeant: David Grimes (YOU) in Very Serious Danger fearing for his own life and for the lives of his teammates tries to desperately help them as the GTC capture them, torture them And Kill Them.

GAMEPLAY:

IMS Death Squad is a shoot'em up action game, where the player has 2 rifles, a pistol and grenades, has to fight off enemies, solve puzzles and loot the world to survive. You start off with the G36C, UMP and USP45 as your primary weapons. The Player has to take cover, sprint away or temporary hide from enemies to regenerate health during gunfights. The environment is overgrown and is explorable with pickups to find, there are text logs explaining background story, medikits, ammo, pipebombs, molotovs, money and more to be found. Exploration is part of the gameplay loop and you have to explore to find resources to help you survive.

VEHICLE GAMEPLAY:

In IMS Death Squad SGT David Grimes will drive IMS Military Equipment from one point to another, This Military Equipment includes Tanks And Quad Bikes.

ADDITIONAL FEATURES:

After Completing the game you can replay it in NEW GAME + Mode, You can use PERMA-DEATH MODE to increase the challenge and beating the game with this mode enabled, unlocks a golden star in the main menu. Tutorials, Aim Assist, Invert Mouse can be enabled and disabled in game settings.

IMS Death Squad has a beautiful but very dangerous world, where you have to save yourself and your teammates with your superior officer trying to kill you and prevent you from carrying out your mission objectives.
